page.description: Specify the text color for the text on each menu item. If you select <Auto>, the text color is computed automatically so that it is readable against the selected menu color.

item.name: Auto
item.description: A contrasting text color is automatically computed so the text is readable against the menu background color.

item.name: Custom
item.description: If chosen, a custom text color can be specified.
